findings.title: Whitelisted Minting
findings.description: The whitelistMinting function allows only whitelisted addresses to mint tokens.

findings.title: Free Minting
findings.description: The freeMint function allows users to mint tokens without any restrictions or checks, potentially leading to unlimited token creation.

findings.title: Public Minting
findings.description: The publicMint function allows anyone to mint tokens without any restrictions or checks.

findings.title: Low ownership transfer
findings.description: Smart contract owner can withdraw funds to beneficiary and change max per wallet.
